thread.title: Larry R
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Larry R

author: Larry R
title: Larry R
text: Very pleased with with everything the way I was treated the product customer service delivery and setup. Little disappointed with professionalism of customer service counter girl could not answer any of my questions when I went back to pay furniture off.
